mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(name, id, password, email, phone, birth, gender) VALUES(#{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT count(email) FROM member WHERE email=#{email}
SELECT count(phone) FROM member WHERE phone=#{phone}
SELECT count(id) FROM member WHERE id=#{id} and password=#{password}
